- get the list
- reach out & help folks re-register
- make sure Dems vote in Apr 7 WI Sup Court race
- repeat in fall 2020 
... in short: don't panic. Organize.

So many formerly incarcerated people face steep barriers to employment long after they’ve paid their debt to society. With our #FairChanceAct, they finally have access to a meaningful second chance. Thanks to all who worked hard for this, including the late Rep. Cummings. https://twitter.com/civilrightsorg/status/1206998059533709315 QT @civilrightsorg The Senate just passed #NDAA.

It includes #FairChanceAct, which gives people with arrest or conviction histories equal access to federal job opportunities. It also includes 12 weeks of paid parental leave for all federal employees.

These are long overdue, notable advancements. http://pbs.twimg.com/media/EMAeUQ5WsAIfgRZ.jpg
FY20 #NDAA headed your way @realDonaldTrump! 📤
